citation.article-title: Emendation of the genus Thermobacteroides: Thermobacteroides proteolyticus sp. nov., a proteolytic acetogen from a methanogenic enrichment.

p.s: Emendation of the genus Thermobacteroides Ben-Bassat and Zeikus 1983, 673.

Thermobacteroides (Ther. mo. bac. te .roi'des. Gr. n. thermus heat ; M . L.n. bacter masc. equivalent of Gr.neut.n. bacterium a staff or rod; Gr.n. idus form, shape; Thermobacteroides rodlike thermophile)
Nonmotile or motile with peritrichous flagella.
Chemoorganotrophs which metabolize carbohydrates or peptone, The major metabolic end products include acetate, ethanol, CO2, and H2.
Thermophilic: optimum growth temperature, 55 to 70°C; no growth occurs below 35°C.
The deoxyribonucleic acid guanine-plus-cystosine coqtent ranges from 30 to 46 mol%.
Found in thermophilic anaerobic digestors and natural thermophilic environments where organic matter is being vigorously decomposed.
Type species: Thermobacteroides acetoethylicus Ben-Bassat and Zeikus 1983, 673.
